languages.text: {n}Выпятив подбородок, Соломон упрямо чеканит:{/n} "Если вы считаете, что я заслужил этого — пусть будет так. Мой призвание — служение Империуму. Какую бы работу вы мне ни назначили — она будет исполнена".
{n}Jutting out his chin, Solomorne stubbornly clips out,{/n} "If you think I deserve it, so be it. My calling is to serve the Imperium. Whatever work you assign me, it will be done."
languages.original_text: {n}Выпятив подбородок, Соломон упрямо чеканит:{/n} "Если вы считаете, что я заслужил этого — пусть будет так. Мой призвание — служение Империуму. Какую бы работу вы мне ни назначили — она будет исполнена".

{n}Jutting out his chin, Solomorne stubbornly clips out,{/n} "If you think I deserve it, so be it. My calling is to serve the Imperium. Whatever work you assign me, it will be done."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは顎を突き出し、頑なに言い放った。{/n}「私にふさわしいとお考えなら、従いましょう。私の使命は帝国に仕えることです。どんな任務であろうと、必ず遂行してみせます」
languages.original_text: {n}Jutting out his chin, Solomorne stubbornly clips out,{/n} "If you think I deserve it, so be it. My calling is to serve the Imperium. Whatever work you assign me, it will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは顎を突き出し、頑なに言い放った。{/n}「私にふさわしいとお考えなら、従いましょう。私の使命は帝国に仕えることです。どんな任務であろうと、必ず遂行してみせます」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schiebt sein Kinn nach vorn und sagt stur:{/n} "Wenn Ihr glaubt, ich verdiene es, soll es so sein. Meine Bestimmung liegt darin, dem Imperium zu dienen. Welche Arbeit Ihr mir auch immer übertragt, sie wird erledigt."
languages.original_text: {n}Jutting out his chin, Solomorne stubbornly clips out,{/n} "If you think I deserve it, so be it. My calling is to serve the Imperium. Whatever work you assign me, it will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schiebt sein Kinn nach vorn und sagt stur:{/n} "Wenn Ihr glaubt, ich verdiene es, soll es so sein. Meine Bestimmung liegt darin, dem Imperium zu dienen. Welche Arbeit Ihr mir auch immer übertragt, sie wird erledigt."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne redresse fièrement le menton et rétorque d'un ton pincé :{/n} « Si vous estimez que je le mérite, alors soit. Ma vocation est de servir l'Imperium. Quelle que soit la tâche que vous me confierez, je m'en acquitterai. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jutting out his chin, Solomorne stubbornly clips out,{/n} "If you think I deserve it, so be it. My calling is to serve the Imperium. Whatever work you assign me, it will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne redresse fièrement le menton et rétorque d'un ton pincé :{/n} « Si vous estimez que je le mérite, alors soit. Ma vocation est de servir l'Imperium. Quelle que soit la tâche que vous me confierez, je m'en acquitterai. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne levanta el mentón y espeta:{/n} «Si considera que lo merezco, que así sea. Mi vocación consiste en servir al Imperium. Cumpliré cualquier tarea que estime oportuno encomendarme».
languages.original_text: {n}Jutting out his chin, Solomorne stubbornly clips out,{/n} "If you think I deserve it, so be it. My calling is to serve the Imperium. Whatever work you assign me, it will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne levanta el mentón y espeta:{/n} «Si considera que lo merezco, que así sea. Mi vocación consiste en servir al Imperium. Cumpliré cualquier tarea que estime oportuno encomendarme».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙扬起了下巴，固执地开了口。{/n}“如果你认为这就是我该做的事情，那如你所愿。我的使命是为帝国服务，只要是你分配给我的任务，我就会做好。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jutting out his chin, Solomorne stubbornly clips out,{/n} "If you think I deserve it, so be it. My calling is to serve the Imperium. Whatever work you assign me, it will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙扬起了下巴，固执地开了口。{/n}“如果你认为这就是我该做的事情，那如你所愿。我的使命是为帝国服务，只要是你分配给我的任务，我就会做好。”

languages.text: {n}Çenesini uzatan Solomorne, meydan okurcasına cevap veriyor.{/n} "Hak ettiğimi düşünüyorsanız başüstüne. Benim kutsal görevim, İmparatorluk'a hizmettir. Bana atadığınız her vazifeyi hakkıyla yerine getiririm."
languages.original_text: {n}Jutting out his chin, Solomorne stubbornly clips out,{/n} "If you think I deserve it, so be it. My calling is to serve the Imperium. Whatever work you assign me, it will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}Çenesini uzatan Solomorne meydan okurcasına cevap verir.{/n} "Hak ettiğimi düşünüyorsanız baş üstüne. Benim kutsal görevim İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmektir. Bana atadığınız her vazifeyi hakkıyla yerine getiririm."
